verbose_text: The relative PCNA expression was significantly decreased in the curcumin treated group as compared to the control group at all time points (P < 0.05) (XREF_FIG); however, the relative expression of p21 WAF1 / CIP1 (XREF_FIG) and p53 (XREF_FIG) was significantly elevated in response to curcumin treatment (all P < 0.05).
